Package it.polimi.se2018.network.server

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Client
    This class represents a Client on the server side
    ColorRestrictions  
    CountdownTimer
    A countdown timer that can run a user-defined action each second that the timer is going (called ` tick`), each time the timer ends and each time the timer is reset.
    Lobby
    This class implements the Lobby, where all the clients are "stored" before becoming real players.
    ParsedBoard
    These classes are needed by GSON for the loading process
    PlayerQueue
    Represents a queue of players waiting for a match.
    Server
    This class is the main Server class.
    ValueRestrictions
